title: How to Draw a Donkey

steps.headline: Draw a neck shaped slightly like a square, and a rectangular shaped body.
Draw the head of the donkey.
steps.description: Add legs and add hooves to bottom of them.

steps.headline: Add an eye, ears, tail, and a muzzle.
Add details and erase any orthogonal lines you don't want any more.
steps.description: Details include a blanket, a smiling mouth, a pupil and eyelashes, and ear creases.

steps.headline: You are done with your donkey!

text:

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Draw the head of the donkey. Add legs and add hooves to bottom of them. Add an eye, ears, tail, and a muzzle. Add details and erase any orthogonal lines you don't want any more. Details include a blanket, a smiling mouth, a pupil and eyelashes, and ear creases. You are done with your donkey! Finished.
